universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation

Annotation Type ActionBarOptions


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ActionBarOptions
    Defines an annotation for determining how an ActionBar should be set.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static int HOME_AS_UP_DISABLED
      Flag indicating that an ActionBar's home as up icon should be disabled (invisible).
      static int HOME_AS_UP_ENABLED
      Flag indicating that an ActionBar's home as up icon should be enabled (visible).
      static int NONE
      Flag for title(), icon() or homeAsUpIndicator() options to identify that the current value should be hided/removed from either ActionBar's title, icon or home as up indicator.
      static int UNCHANGED
      Flag for all options from this annotation that can be used to identify that current value for such option should be left unchanged.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int homeAsUp
      Flag indicating whether to display/hide an ActionBar's home as up icon.
      int homeAsUpIndicator
      A resource id of the drawable that should be set as home as up indicator for an ActionBar.
      int homeAsUpVectorIndicator
      A resource id of the vector drawable that should be set as home as up indicator for an ActionBar.
      int icon
      A resource id of the desired image which should be set as icon for an ActionBar.
      int title
      A resource id of the desired text that should be set as title for an ActionBar.

    • Field Detail

      • UNCHANGED

        public static final int UNCHANGED
        Flag for all options from this annotation that can be used to identify that current value for such option should be left unchanged.

      • NONE

        public static final int NONE
        Flag for title(), icon() or homeAsUpIndicator() options to identify that the current value should be hided/removed from either ActionBar's title, icon or home as up indicator.

      • HOME_AS_UP_ENABLED

        public static final int HOME_AS_UP_ENABLED
        Flag indicating that an ActionBar's home as up icon should be enabled (visible).

      • HOME_AS_UP_DISABLED

        public static final int HOME_AS_UP_DISABLED
        Flag indicating that an ActionBar's home as up icon should be disabled (invisible).

    • Element Detail

      • title

        @StringRes
public abstract int title
        A resource id of the desired text that should be set as title for an ActionBar.

        Use NONE to remove the current title from ActionBar.

        Default value: UNCHANGED

        See Also:
        icon(), ActionBar.setTitle(int)
        Default:
        -1

      • icon

        @DrawableRes
public abstract int icon
        A resource id of the desired image which should be set as icon for an ActionBar.

        Use NONE to hide/remove the current icon from ActionBar.

        Default value: UNCHANGED

        See Also:
        title(), ActionBar.setIcon(int)
        Default:
        -1

      • homeAsUp

        public abstract int homeAsUp
        Flag indicating whether to display/hide an ActionBar's home as up icon. May be one of HOME_AS_UP_ENABLED, HOME_AS_UP_DISABLED or UNCHANGED to not "touch" home as up icon.

        Default value: UNCHANGED

        See Also:
        homeAsUpVectorIndicator(), homeAsUpIndicator(), ActionBar.setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled(boolean)
        Default:
        -1

      • homeAsUpVectorIndicator

        @DrawableRes
public abstract int homeAsUpVectorIndicator
        A resource id of the vector drawable that should be set as home as up indicator for an ActionBar.

        Use NONE to hide/remove the current home as up indicator from ActionBar.

        Default value: UNCHANGED

        See Also:
        homeAsUp(), homeAsUpIndicator(), ActionBar.setHomeAsUpIndicator(Drawable)
        Default:
        -1

      • homeAsUpIndicator

        @DrawableRes
public abstract int homeAsUpIndicator
        A resource id of the drawable that should be set as home as up indicator for an ActionBar.

        Use NONE to hide/remove the current home as up indicator from ActionBar.

        Default value: UNCHANGED

        See Also:
        homeAsUp(), homeAsUpVectorIndicator(), ActionBar.setHomeAsUpIndicator(int), ActionBar.setHomeAsUpIndicator(Drawable)
        Default:
        -1
